I think if someone's going to make that argument about redeployment, they should be very honest about what the likely consequences on the ground in Iraq are.
A lot of hope is sort of being pinned on this bipartisan commission, which met today with the president.

At this point they're barely talking to each other, and that will require the involvement of the neighbors.
My guess is it will be somewhere between stay the course and withdraw.
